word: Masturbation. [NOTE: THE AUTHOR TREATS THIS SUBJECT AT LENGTH IN TESTIMONIES, VOL. 2, PP. 346-353, 480-482, AND THE OUT-OF-PRINT PAMPHLET AN APPEAL TO MOTHERS (1864).
